wikipedia_page.main: Sir Philip Lavallin Wroughton  (19 April 1933 – 7 November 2020) was the Lord Lieutenant of Berkshire from 1995 until 2008.

response: He was the father of Philip Lavallin Wroughton, appointed Lord Lieutenant of Berkshire in 1995. Puxley/Wroughton was the uncle of James Puxley, appointed High Sheriff of Berkshire for 2000–2001.
